title: Moving to Carrollton, Texas?
posting_body: Welcome to Sevilla Condos!Sevilla Condos is surrounded by mature oak trees that whisk you away from the noise of a busy day while still being conveniently located minutes from Carrolltons Historic Downtown.
Still holding on to its old world charm, Carrollton has been expanding with many new restaurants and shops making this a premiere location for the Dallas-Fort Worth area.
Tie that into the easy access to major highways such as the President George Bush Tollway, 35E, and 635; Sevilla is the perfect location to call home.
Our community offers large, open floorplans including some townhomes.
In our homes you will find features such as: wood-like plank style flooring, full size washer/dryer connections, fireplaces and lots of closet space.
These apartments were made with you in mind!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
